text:
e="preserve">Brockhampton is a village and civil parish in Herefordshire, England. The village is close to the River Wye. It is 9 miles (14 kilometres) south-east of Hereford, 8 miles (13 kilometres) north of Ross-on-Wye and 10 miles (16 kilometres) south-west of Ledbury.
Bus.
The 456 and 457 buses ran by Nick Maddy Coaches pass through Brockhampton.
Walking.
The 136 mile (219 kilometre) Wye Valley Walk goes through Brockhampton.
Road.
The B4224 road passes near Brockhampton.
